post.body: I guess SOMEBODY had to like it, or it wouldn't have been made.
I second that - hubby and I COULD NOT finish watching it. It just got worse and worse.
Oh - I'm so excited, my niece is dancing in the parade there, so my my mom and I are taking her and her sister. I can't wait!
A ton of my peeps have read, and loved it too - I'm gonna go for it. Thanks for the recomm
Ohhh, what ar eyou making for dinner??
Oh - Keelyn's dancing in the x-mas parade so me, mama, and the girls are going next week.
THANK YOU for sharing that trailer - I can't wait!!!
Don't worry - I don't have one either.
how is Diane?
On the road to Orlando - only 6 hours to go.
Yikes it's chilly this morning. Just one more day until I leave for Disney!!! I've GOT to get packed tonight - must start my list.
Trying desperately to write some copy, but all I can think about is needing to get packed and ready for the trip.
I feel like I'm just coming out of a 4-day (turkey induced) coma. Coming back to work was SO HARD. Now two work days- then DISNEY!
Roll tide!!!
After eating ALL DAY yesterday, the question this morning is - what's for breakfast?
Chillin' at the hizzouse with some Sonic slushes (it's the only thing open in Fairhope) and my hubby - watching Ace of Cakes.
Did MAcy's just "Rick Roll" us?
Yay twitterific is working on my iPhone again.
Think I may head on home, I'm aching to create (and to see my hubby)
I think I'm gonna break down and BUY "Twilight" tonight to read over the holiday.
I love hearing what others' plans are for T'giving. Mine are so boring - lunch with hubby's family, dinner with mine. What are your plans?
Anxious about work today. Another client is upset. How do I tell them I have too many clients to just focus on them all the time?
lunchin' in fronteer land! Disney's so awesome.
While I'm still lovin Disney- I hate I'm in Fl for the Alabama game. Roll tide.
Back at work today - really don't want to be here. UGH. Apparently there's been some changes while I was gone for 4 days.
Frustrated that my twirl is not working right now - what up with that? Not a great start to my morning.
Finally, JUST hung my first holiday decoration - the jingle bell wreath is on the door. Hurray!!
At home today. Hubby let me oversleep this morning, so I'm getting a really late start on the day.
Yeah, I broke my work computer this morning (IDK how). Have been home since, waiting for phone calls - want to go shopping.
For some reason, I'm having trouble with twhirl on my work computer. What a bummer. I'm testing out other means to use twitter at work.
waiting for hubby so we can get lunch before a niece's b-day party. Looks like we'll be late to the party - ugh!!
Cinn. rolls and coffee with hubby, watching the dog whisperer, browsing facebook before facing the mountain of wrapping, crafting, and more.
Just a little longer to Margarita Friday with hubby. Looking forward to it!!
Ahhhhhh - I just wanna get my check. So, I'm WAITING until 5 to leave work today. It's not impossible, just aggravating.
Oy, those ten pounds I lost won't be staying off unless my office manager's wife STOPS sending such yummy treats to the office.
YAY!! Hubby's present was in my seat when I got back from 'lunch' (more shopping) Now there's only a few,small inessentials left to find.
Getting frustrated with monotonous work task. On the bright side, at least I found something to do while I'm here.
really wanting to go home right now and work on some gifts, but waiting for UPS to deliver Hubby's present to the office first.
Ate too much. I need to remember that I cut my portion sizes and can't eat a whole sandwich anymore.
Struggling to focus on only one thing at a time. I'm afraid that I'll doze off at my desk if I don't have a plethora of tasks.
Gah! Hubby's present still hasn't shipped. It BETTER be here before Christmas Eve or I may have a breakdown.
Is it bad that I would rather be cleaning my house than at work?
Just ordered hubby's Christmas present. Was more than I wanted to spend, but he'll be surprised - yay!
At work with a loss of what to do today since clients have still not gotten back to me. Ugh.
Just realized I have SO MUCH stuff to get done tonight. Why-o-why do I procrastinate and let time get the better of me?
Hmmm, tummy doesn't feel so good. I think it's protesting.
I think it's time to re-start the getting up from my desk every half hour in an attempt to prevent any more ass-spreadage.
Deciding whether or not I'm ready to call in my lunch order, really just working on the motivation to get out of my office chair.
Not sure why I feel so frustrated with everybody and everything today.
OMG - so annoyed with co-worker. Please STOP USING SPEAKER PHONE. . . There is a God - he's leaving on a service call.
Back to the grind today. I wasn't ready to get up this early and face the fog.
Heading out to see Benjamin button -hubby actually initiated going to see it. Hope it's good!
Down in gulf shores, chillin' on the beach. About to start up the iPod and start craftilating.
Ugh - woke up with a sinus headache. Trying to silence the pounding with waffles and coffee.
Taking a cleaning break and watching the cat enjoy her Christmas presents. May wander into the craft room for a moment or two. . .
Since I lucked out in being off again today - I think I'll work on the house some today. I might even get out and was the car. Egad!!
Heading back home w/o bike ride - Temp dropped and sky's a liitle grey, didn't want to risk it.
Just won a prize at the hangout for standing on my barstool and screaming out 'ren & stimpy'
After a hike by the river- we're trying to find someplace open for lunch in Gulf Shores before biking.
Trying to decide how to spend our New Year's Day, and it's almost half over already. POssibly heading to the Gulf for a bike ride.
Making omelets and toast, about to watch the Rose Parade.
Chilling before heading out for a bonfire, fireworks, and some rock band-playing. Happy New Year y'all!!!
Desperately trying to concentrate on work. It's difficult on such a lovely day.
Staving - hubby needs me to run out for lunch since he's starting a new project. I'm happy to oblige since it'll get me out of the house.
